name: Redix Information Social Education Society
briefDescription: RISES was started as a group of vibrant volunteers from Dewas . The group was very much concerned about the child education, health, pulse polio, blood donation and smoke free environment in the society.This all made them to initiate voluntary action for the same in their respective areas. The important feature of the action was shram-dan by volunteers and people from the society. This was the beginning of RISES through collective efforts of the community. These efforts continued and many dimensions added with then as the time passed.RISES is registered under Madhya Pradesh Society Registration Act 1973 on 2nd February 2013.It is a non government organization (NGO) established to bring vital changes in the society through participatory ef
